Text: The 1972 Italian Open was a combined men's and women's tennis tournament that was played by men on outdoor clay courts at the Foro Italico in Rome, Italy.

Text: 1972 Italian Open (tennis): The men's and women's tournament were part of the 1972 Commercial Union Assurance Grand Prix.
